idlastro/coyote/

getprimaryscreensize.pro


top source GetPrimaryScreenSize

Graphics

result = GetPrimaryScreenSize( [Exclude_Taskbar=Exclude_Taskbar])

Provides a way to get the screen size of the primary monitor, especially when there are several being used.

Keywords

Exclude_Taskbar in optional default=0

Set this keyword to exclude the taskbar from the monitor size. This keyword is ignored on all but Windows machines.

Author information

Author:

Dick Jackson, www.dick-jackson.com
